product_name: Smith Dover ChromaPop Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: An essential piece of gear for active adventurers, the Smith Dover ChromaPop Polarized Sunglasses deliver superb coverage and clarity, with protective lens coatings to eliminate glare. ChromaPop lenses use a proprietary technology to optimize color and increase clarity and definition, enabling you to see the outside world with exceptional vibrance. Polarized glass lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Black frames feature gray-green tinted lenses, ideal for medium-to-bright light. Matte Black frames feature platinum tinted lenses, ideal for bright days and direct sunlight. Havana frames feature brown tinted lenses that enhance your vision in a wide range of light and weather conditions. The Smith Dover ChromaPop Polarized Sunglasses feature a hydrophilic Megol nosepiece and temple ends that get tacky when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather. 53% bio-based Evolve frames are made with Rilsan(R) Clear, a light, durable, non-petroleum-based material derived from renewable, non-GMO castor plants.
short_description: An essential piece of gear for active adventurers, the Smith Dover ChromaPop Polarized Sunglasses deliver superb coverage and clarity, with protective lens coatings to eliminate glare.
